learnings: Account deletion API already existed in routes/api/settings/account.ts
SettingsPage had state for delete modal but no UI - needed to add the button and modal
Must pass accountInfo prop from route handler to component for proper confirmation flow
SwipeableListItem island created with touch event handlers for swipe gestures
Mobile detection uses globalThis.innerWidth (not window) for Deno compatibility
Library tabs show list view on mobile (<768px) with swipe actions, grid view on desktop
Context-aware actions based on current tab (watched/to_watch/favourites)
Existing QuickActions component has the API patterns for watchlist/favourite/watched actions
Created analytics_events table with JSONB properties for flexible event data
Client-side tracking uses navigator.sendBeacon for reliability during page unload
Session ID stored in httpOnly cookie for cross-page tracking without auth
Admin dashboard at /admin/analytics - restricted to first registered user
Analytics tracking is non-blocking to avoid impacting user experience
Fresh Head component from $fresh/runtime.ts injects into <head> from page components
Head title overrides _app.tsx title - page-specific titles work correctly
Content detail page uses TMDB poster for og:image (500px) and backdrop for twitter:image (1280px)
Open Graph type video.movie/video.tv_show for content pages, website for other pages
Description truncated to 160 chars for meta description best practice
Fresh routes with .xml.ts or .txt.ts extensions correctly return non-HTML content types
sitemap.xml returns application/xml Content-Type for valid XML sitemap
robots.txt includes Sitemap directive pointing to sitemap.xml for crawlers
TMDB trending content can be included in sitemap for dynamic content URLs
Static pages (home, browse, search, premium, login, signup) have different priority/changefreq settings
Fresh requires manual fresh.gen.ts update or server restart to pick up new routes
Use 'deno task start' not 'deno task dev' for this project
Privacy policy covers: data collection, third-party services (TMDB, OpenAI, Stripe, Google OAuth), data security, user rights, cookies, data retention
Footer updated with legal links navigation section for both privacy and terms pages
Terms of service follows same pattern as privacy policy - consistent styling
SignupForm island needs the terms reference (not signup.tsx route) since form is client-rendered
Footer already had the /terms link from privacy policy story - link ready before page existed
Fresh automatically updates fresh.gen.ts when new routes are added
